Mobile Application

Cross-platform mobile application for habit formation and tracking, featuring data analytics and behavioral insights. Demonstrates product management skills through user-centered design and iterative development approach.

Tech Stack

  • React Native
  • TypeScript
  • Node.js
  • PostgreSQL
  • Firebase

Status

In Development

Key Outcomes

  • Architected scalable database schema for habit tracking and analytics
  • Implemented user authentication and data synchronization
  • Designed intuitive UX flow based on behavioral psychology principles
